statements: SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, department, salary FROM public_sector_employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY department DESC, hire_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(salary) AS average_salary FROM public_sector_employees;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, hire_date FROM public_sector_employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, salary FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS num_employees FROM public_sector_employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT full_name, position, hire_date FROM public_sector_employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(salary) AS avg_salary, MAX(salary) AS max_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM public_sector_employees JOIN employee_contacts ON public_sector_employees.employee_id = employee_contacts.employee_id;
SELECT department, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM public_sector_employees GROUP BY department ORDER BY avg_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM public_sector_employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM public_sector_employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, leave_start_date, leave_end_date FROM public_sector_employees JOIN employee_leaves ON public_sector_employees.employee_id = employee_leaves.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM public_sector_employees;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, salary, email FROM public_sector_employees JOIN employee_contacts ON public_sector_employees.employee_id = employee_contacts.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_leaves WHERE leave_type='Annual Leave' ORDER BY leave_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees;
SELECT name, salary FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, name, joining_date FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employee_addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT employee_id, phone_number, email FROM employee_contacts;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY joining_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, department, salary FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT e.name, a.address_line, a.city, a.state FROM public_sector_employees e JOIN employee_addresses a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'IT';
SELECT e.name, c.phone_number, c.email FROM public_sector_employees e JOIN employee_contacts c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT e.name, l.annual_leave_days, l.sick_leave_days FROM public_sector_employees e JOIN employee_leave_balances l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id WHERE l.annual_leave_days < 20 ORDER BY l.annual_leave_days ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees;
SELECT id, name, salary FROM public_sector_employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT name, department, position FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, course_name, instructor FROM employee_training_records ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_sector_employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, department, position FROM public_sector_employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, email, phone_number FROM employee_contacts WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_records WHERE leave_type = 'Vacation' AND status = 'Approved' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT review_date, reviewer, rating, comments FROM employee_performance_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC, review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
